credit_line: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: linen, silk
Technique: embroidered in counted thread stitches, deflected element work, cross and satin stitches
description: Worked in silk in brown, blues, greens, yellows, and off-white on a sheer linen ground.  At top, the initials CBT in a heart-shaped floral wreath, the Lamb of God, Christ on the cross, a lady and gentleman hunting birds, a castle, alphabets and numerals, patches of bargello work, various floral motifs, etc.
name: Sampler
